definition: BaiSheng, common name for Chinese company/PakSing, common Hong Kong company name

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
to emerge victorious in every battle/to be ever-victorious
Tricon Global Restaurants (incl. Pizza Hut and KFC)
pinyin: Bai3 sheng4 Can1 yin3 Ji2 tuan2

definition: Tricon Global Restaurants (incl. Pizza Hut and KFC)

sentences.english: The author hopes this research will be really helpful for the development of Baisheng town.
sentences.chinese: 希望通過本文能對百勝鎮的發展起到切實可行的作用。

sentences.english: He is nearly ever successful on the market, ever-victorious.
sentences.chinese: 他在商場上幾乎無往不利，百戰百勝。

sentences.english: The company considers China to be its “leading growth story” according to Novack.
sentences.chinese: 諾瓦克稱，百勝將中國視爲其“主要的增長市場”。

sentences.english: The Chinese consumer has become the star in this business’ growth story.
sentences.chinese: 中國消費者已經成爲百勝業績增長中的頭號功臣。

sentences.english: His Troglodyte hordes are feared the world over, especially in the dark tunnels of Nighon.
sentences.chinese: 他的洞穴人軍隊在尼根黑暗的坑道中百戰百勝。

sentences.english: This psychological tactics used properly, without the.
sentences.chinese: 這種心理戰術運用得當，無不百戰百勝。

sentences.english: Software package management is primarily handled by the yum utility.
sentences.chinese: 軟件包管理主要是由百勝公用程式。

definition: to form one's own group or school of thought/to set up one's own business/to establish oneself
tycoon/magnate/big player (including company, country, school etc)/big shot
